job.title: Principal Software Engineer ( TS/SCI)
job.description: If you are a Principal Software Engineer  TSSCI with experience please read onbrbrWe are a leading national company that focuses on helping segments off the government improve their software and build great new products This role will be focused on the geospatial worldbrbrTop Reasons to Work with UsbrbrChance to work on very interesting projects using the latest in technologybrWe offer a strong relocation packagebrGreat compensation packagebrChance to make an impact on the worldbrGreat leadership team and culturebrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrYou will be developing and implementing software applications for the geospatial worldbrYou will be writing test scripts test driven development in an agile environmentbrYou will be creating testing and maintaining software products to ensure strong functionalitybrYou will be working with and training junior developersbrbrWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrMust have a TSSCI clearancebrbrExperience with JavapythonbrExperience with JavascriptbrMicroservice architecture and designbrbrSo if you are a Principal Software Engineer  TSSCI with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrKeithEllisCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  KE21595930  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulKeith Ellis  Recruiting Manager  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll
